definition: (Internet slang) spoiled city girl from a rich family
hole/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for cave dwellings
surname Kong
a freckle/lentigo
small bird/sparrow/also pr. [qiao3]
archaic variant of 汝[ru3]
female/woman/daughter
(Internet slang) guy who grew up in the countryside and gained a foothold in the city through hard work
materialistic woman/(slang) gold-digger
those who did not benefit from the Chinese economic reforms of the 1980s/see also 富二代[fu4 er4 dai4]
the families are well-matched in terms of social status (idiom)/(of a prospective marriage partner) an appropriate match
(coll.) (neologism c. 2017, a play on 伏地魔[Fu2 di4 mo2]) woman who devotes herself to supporting her little brother (assisting him with his studies, giving money to help him buy a house etc)
to favor the rich and disdain the poor (idiom)/snobbish
"Ms Perfect" (i.e. fair-skinned, rich and beautiful) (Internet slang)
children of entrepreneurs who became wealthy under Deng Xiaoping's economic reforms in the 1980s/see also 窮二代|穷二代[qiong2 er4 dai4]
children of officials/word created by analogy with 富二代[fu4 er4 dai4]
"Mr Perfect" (i.e. tall, rich and handsome) (Internet slang)
"leftover woman" (successful career woman who has remained single)
to worship money/to be mad about money
"green tea bitch", a girl who seems innocent and charming but is actually calculating and manipulative
If you marry a chicken, follow the chicken (idiom); A woman should follow whatever her husband orders./We must learn to accept the people around us.
lit. naked wedding/no-frills civil wedding ceremony lacking a material foundation: no car, house, reception, rings, or honeymoon
to marry and live with the bride's family (inverting traditional Chinese expectations)
